/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees and bushes on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the view. The predominant colors in the image are green, blue, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
